text:
Hey everyone :wave:
I’m Nitish R.G., a Data Science student at IIT Madras and a software developer working at the intersection of backend systems and ML.

I currently intern at  Infosys Springboard working on  ML pipelines, and production-ready APIs using Python, FastAPI, SQL, Docker, and cloud tools.

Here to learn fast, contribute meaningfully, and collaborate with people building impactful open-source data science tools at R...

GitHub: <https://github.com/NITISH-R-G|https://github.com/NITISH-R-G>
